meanings.definition: Quillajas: a type of tree native to Chile
meanings.sent1: The quillajas provide shade and beauty in the Chilean forests.
meanings.sent2: Many animals find shelter in the branches of the quillajas.
meanings.sent3: The quillajas in the park seem to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent4: The quillajas stand tall like guardians of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The quillajas sway gently in the breeze, their leaves rustling softly.

meanings.sent3: The quillajas bark adds a touch of magic to the soap-making process.
meanings.sent4: The quillajas bark transforms ordinary soap into a luxurious treat.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of quillajas fills the air as the soap cures under the sun.
